page.title: 07Bramley 1985 -Family Life-2
page.content: Out of 24 children in our class (9/10 year olds),17 visit their{Grandparents weekly. { Pocket money}ranges from 50p to Â£5! 9 children choose their own clothes. 12 children said that their Mother is the{disciplinarian.}All 24 had been smacked at some time; 8 given the belt; 15 slippered, and 7 hit with a wooden spoon! 22 children help in the house, whilst 2 never help. 21 children have{pets.}These include dogs, cats,ferrets, pheasants,budgies, ducks,guinea pigs,gerbils and pigeons. The most{common weekday foods}were beans,chips,sausage,bacon,beefburgers and fishfingers.All but 1 family had a 'traditional' Sunday dinner, and then chicken was popular.12 had Sunday tea. All families do a{big weekly shop}at supermarkets. 18 families have a{daily newspaper.
